name: BdfEditor
short_description:
BDF file preview, editing tools.

V1.02 (2012/11/15)
+. Increase character (code) search function.
+. Increase USBKey registered function.
+. Increase log reading function.
+. Increase save function (registered party effective)
*. Modify coordinates in the edit state can't display bug.

V1.01 (2012/11/13)
+. Increase automatic update feature.
+. Increase the direction key preview.
+. Increase editing operation shortcut key (amplification, narrow, feel free to move, undo and redo).
*. Modify editing record record mode (undo, then edit record, then just cancel part can't reduction).


V1.00 (2012/11/10)
+. Support 1:1 batch show preview.
+. Support font, and character information display.
+. Support double click edit a character.
+. Support basic edit function, simple operation, easy to use, copy Microsoft drawing style.
